Text: Affects GBP  U.S.-listed shares of Tesla Inc rival NIO Inc tumbled more than 18% on Tuesday after the Chinese electric carmaker posted a drop in quarterly vehicle sales, blaming a cut in subsidies and weak demand.
Cause: the Chinese electric carmaker posted a drop in quarterly vehicle sales, blaming a cut in subsidies and weak demand.
Effect: Affects GBP  U.S.-listed shares of Tesla Inc rival NIO Inc tumbled more than 18% on Tuesday
